item.title: Bandit-Feedback Online Multiclass Classification: Variants and Tradeoffs
item.description: This paper reveals the optimal mistake bounds for online multiclass classification under bandit feedback, showing the cost of limited feedback is at most O(k) times higher than full information, where…
